SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexJongmokList 지수종목상세 정보를 조회한다. */
m168uidxmap.isin_code AS isin_code /* 종목코드 */ , td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 한글종목명 */
, td_index_basic.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */
, 0 AS in_out_rate /* 편입비중 */ , m168uidxmap.ceiling_percnt AS ceiling_percnt /* CEILING비중 */ , m168uidxmap.style_includ_percnt AS style_includ_percnt /* 스타일포함비중 */ , m168uidxcomp.f30812 AS f30812 /* 상장주식수 */ , m168uidxcomp.f30813 AS f30813 /* 유동주식비율 */
, m168uidxcomp.f03003 AS f03003 /* 전일종가 */ , m168uidxcomp.f34241 AS f34241 /* 가격산정구분(0:실시간1:종가) */
FROM m168uidxmap INNER JOIN m168uidxcomp ON ( m168uidxmap.f12506 = m168uidxcomp.f12506 AND m168uidxmap.gubun = m168uidxcomp.gubun AND m168uidxmap.isin_code = m168uidxcomp.f16013 ) INNER JOIN td_index_basic ON m168uidxmap.F12506 = ( SELECT MAX( F12506 ) FROM m168uidxmap ) AND m168uidxmap.up_code = CASE WHEN td_index_basic.f16013 LIKE '60___' /* 단축코드 */ THEN CONCAT( 'MFI' , SUBSTR( td_index_basic.f16013, -3 ) )
WHEN td_index_basic.f16013 LIKE '62___' /* 단축코드 */ THEN CONCAT( 'WFN' , SUBSTR( td_index_basic.f16013, -3 ) ) END
WHERE 1 = 1
AND td_index_basic.large_type = #{large_type}
AND m168uidxmap.isin_code IN ( SELECT td_kspjong_basic.F16012 FROM td_kspjong_basic WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( td_kspjong_basic.F16013 LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchData}, '%' ) OR td_kspjong_basic.F16002 LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchData}, '%' ) )
) ORDER BY m168uidxmap.isin_code DESC /* 입회일 */ , td_index_basic.f16013

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexList 검색영역에 일치하는 지수정보를 조회한다. */ td_index_basic.*
FROM ( SELECT td_index_basic.f12506 AS f12506 /* 입회일 */ , td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , td_index_basic.f15009 AS f15009 /* 시가 */ , td_index_basic.f15010 AS f15010 /* 고가 */ , td_index_basic.f15011 AS f15011 /* 저가 */ , td_index_basic.f15001 AS f15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_index_basic.f15007 AS f15007 /* 기준가 */ , td_index_basic.f15015 AS f15015 /* 거래량 */ , td_index_basic.f15023 AS f15023 /* 거래대금 */ , td_index_basic.f15472 AS f15472 /* 대비 */ , td_index_basic.f15004 AS f15004 /* 등락율 */ , td_index_basic.f15006 AS f15006 /* 등락구분(1:상한/2:상승/3:보합/4:하한/5:하락/6:기세상한/7:기세상승/8:기세하한/9:기세하락) */ , td_index_basic.f15028 AS f15028 /* 시가총액 */ , td_index_basic.large_type AS large_type /* 지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP) */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ , td_index_basic.market_id AS market_id /* 시장 ID */ , td_index_basic.std_index AS std_index /* 기준지수 */ , td_index_basic.std_date AS std_date /* 기준일 */ , td_index_basic.anno_date AS anno_date /* 발표일 */ , td_index_basic.index_cal_method AS index_cal_method /* 지수산출방식 */ , td_index_basic.std_capital AS std_capital /* 기준시가총액 */ , td_index_basic.fixed_cash AS fixed_cash /* 고정현금 */ , td_index_basic.flowrate_yn AS flowrate_yn /* 유동비율적용여부 */
FROM td_index_basic WHERE 1 = 1
AND td_index_basic.large_type = #{large_type}
AND ( td_index_basic.f16013 LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchData} , '%' ) /* 단축코드 */ OR td_index_basic.f16002 LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #{searchData} , '%' ) /* 한글종목명 */ )
ORDER BY td_index_basic.F16013 , td_index_basic.market_id
LIMIT 0, 1
) td_index_basic
WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexBasicDetail 지수 기본정보를 조회한다. */ td_index_basic.f12506 AS f12506 /* 입회일 */ , DATE_FORMAT( td_index_basic.f12506, '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS fmt_f12506 /* 포맷된 입회일 */ , td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , td_index_basic.f15009 AS f15009 /* 시가 */ , td_index_basic.f15010 AS f15010 /* 고가 */ , td_index_basic.f15011 AS f15011 /* 저가 */ , td_index_basic.f15001 AS f15001 /* 현재가 */ , td_index_basic.f15007 AS f15007 /* 기준가 */ , td_index_basic.f15015 AS f15015 /* 거래량 */ , td_index_basic.f15023 AS f15023 /* 거래대금 */ , td_index_basic.f15472 AS f15472 /* 대비 */ , td_index_basic.f15004 AS f15004 /* 등락율 */ , td_index_basic.f15006 AS f15006 /* 등락구분(1:상한/2:상승/3:보합/4:하한/5:하락/6:기세상한/7:기세상승/8:기세하한/9:기세하락) */ , td_index_basic.f15028 AS f15028 /* 시가총액 */ , td_index_basic.large_type AS large_type /* 지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP) */ , td_index_basic.middle_type AS middle_type /* 지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN) */ , td_index_basic.market_id AS market_id /* 시장 ID */ , td_index_basic.std_index AS std_index /* 기준지수 */ , td_index_basic.std_date AS std_date /* 기준일 */ , DATE_FORMAT( td_index_basic.std_date, '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS fmt_std_date /* 기준일 */ , td_index_basic.anno_date AS anno_date /* 발표일 */ , td_index_basic.index_cal_method AS index_cal_method /* 지수산출방식 */ , td_index_basic.std_capital AS std_capital /* 기준시가총액 */ , td_index_basic.fixed_cash AS fixed_cash /* 고정현금 */ , td_index_basic.flowrate_yn AS flowrate_yn /* 유동비율적용여부 */
FROM td_index_basic
WHERE td_index_basic.f16013 = #{f16013} /* 단축코드 */ AND td_index_basic.market_id = #{market_id} /* 시장 ID */

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexDetailList 검색영역에 일치하는 지수정보를 조회한다. */
MAP.isin_code AS isin_code /* 종목코드 */ , MAP.ceiling_percnt AS ceiling_percnt /* CEILING비중 */ , MAP.F16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */ , MAP.style_includ_percnt AS style_includ_percnt /* 스타일포함비중 */
, COMP.f30812 AS f30812 /* 상장주식수 */ , COMP.f30813 AS f30813 /* 유동주식비율 */ , COMP.f03003 AS f03003 /* 전일종가 */ , COMP.f34241 AS f34241 /* 가격산정구분(0:실시간1:종가) */
FROM ( SELECT F12506 , ISIN_CODE , UP_CODE , CEILING_PERCNT , STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , GUBUN , F16002 FROM ( SELECT A.F12506 , A.ISIN_CODE , A.UP_CODE , A.CEILING_PERCNT , A.STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , A.GUBUN , B.F16002
FROM m168uidxmap A INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic B ON A.F12506 = ( SELECT MAX( m168uidxmap.F12506 ) FROM m168uidxmap ) AND A.ISIN_CODE = B.F16012
WHERE A.UP_CODE = CONCAT( IF( SUBSTR(#{f16013}, 1, 2 ) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN' ), substr(#{f16013}, 3) ) ORDER BY A.ISIN_CODE , A.F12506 DESC ) a WHERE a.F12506 = ( SELECT MAX(AA.F12506) /* 최근 일자 */ FROM m168uidxmap AA INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic BB ON AA.F12506 = ( SELECT MAX( m168uidxmap.F12506 ) FROM m168uidxmap ) AND AA.ISIN_CODE = BB.F16012
WHERE AA.UP_CODE = CONCAT( IF(substr(#{f16013}, 1, 2) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN'), substr(#{f16013}, 3)) ) ) MAP
INNER JOIN m168uidxcomp COMP ON MAP.F12506 = COMP.F12506 AND MAP.ISIN_CODE = COMP.F16013 AND MAP.GUBUN = COMP.GUBUN
ORDER BY MAP.isin_code DESC /* 입회일 */

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexFixData 지수조치 현황의 기본정보를 조회한다. */ td_index_basic.f16013 AS f16013 /* 단축코드 */ , td_index_basic.f16002 AS f16002 /* 한글종목명 */
, DATE_FORMAT( now() , '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS fix_date /* 조치 기준일 */
, DATE_FORMAT( now() , '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS now_date /* 당일 */ , 1010101010 AS now_date_money /* 당일 금액 */ , 1111 AS now_date_change_money /* 당일 변경 금액 */
, DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD( now() , interval - 1 day ) , '%Y.%m.%d' ) AS oper_date /* 직전 영업일 */ , 2010101010 AS oper_date_money /* 직전 영업일 금액 */
FROM td_index_basic
WHERE 1 = 1
AND td_index_basic.f16013 = #{f16013} /* 단축코드 */ AND td_index_basic.market_id = #{market_id} /* 시장 ID */
AND td_index_basic.f16013 = #{f16257} /* 단축코드 = ETP기초지수코드 */ AND td_index_basic.market_id LIKE CONCAT( '_' , LPAD( #{f34239}, 3, '0' ) , '%' ) /* 시장 ID = ETP기초지수MID */

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexFixJongmokInoutList 지수조치 종목 편출입 정보를 조회한다. */ base.code AS code /* Code */ , base.name AS name /* 종목명 */ , base.gubun AS gubun /* 구분 */ , CASE WHEN base.gubun = '1' THEN '편입' ELSE '편출' END AS gubun_name , base.rate AS rate /* 비중 */
FROM ( SELECT '086900' AS code /* Code */ , '메디톡스' AS name /* 종목명 */ , '1' AS gubun /* 구분 */ , '34.21' AS rate /* 비중 */ FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '09700' AS code /* Code */ , '제넥신' AS name /* 종목명 */ , '1' AS gubun /* 구분 */ , '10.15' AS rate /* 비중 */ FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '128940' AS code /* Code */ , '한미약품' AS name /* 종목명 */ , '0' AS gubun /* 구분 */ , '34.15' AS rate /* 비중 */
FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '028300' AS code /* Code */ , '에이치 옐비' AS name /* 종목명 */ , '0' AS gubun /* 구분 */ , '10.35' AS rate /* 비중 */ FROM dual
) base

SELECT /* indexDetail.getIndexFixModifyList 지수채용 주식수 변경 정보를 조회한다. */ base.code AS code /* Code */ , base.name AS name /* 종목명 */ , base.now_date_money AS now_date_money /* 편입금액 */ , base.prev_date_money AS prev_date_money /* 편출금액 */ , base.in_out_money AS in_out_money /* 변경분 */
FROM ( SELECT '086900' AS code /* Code */ , '메디톡스' AS name /* 종목명 */ , 112233 AS now_date_money /* 당일 금액 */ , 3434 AS prev_date_money /* 전일 금액 */ , '+122' AS in_out_money /* 변경분 */ FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '12300' AS code /* Code */ , '삼성전자' AS name /* 종목명 */ , 22333 AS now_date_money /* 당일 금액 */ , 33343 AS prev_date_money /* 전일 금액 */ , '+233' AS in_out_money /* 변경분 */ FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '42100' AS code /* Code */ , '셀트리온' AS name /* 종목명 */ , 10022 AS now_date_money /* 당일 금액 */ , 4555 AS prev_date_money /* 전일 금액 */ , '+654' AS in_out_money /* 변경분 */
FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT '67779' AS code /* Code */ , 'NAVER' AS name /* 종목명 */ , 78933 AS now_date_money /* 당일 금액 */ , 6789 AS prev_date_money /* 전일 금액 */ , '+7654' AS in_out_money /* 변경분 */ FROM dual
) base

SELECT /* indexDetail.getM168uidxList 검색영역에 일치하는 지수정보를 조회한다. */ m168uidxmap.f12506 AS f12506 /* 일자 */ , m168uidxmap.gubun AS gubun /* WISEFN/FNGUIDE */
, m168uidxmap.up_code AS up_code /* 업종코드 */ , m168uidxmap.isin_code AS isin_code /* 종목코드 */ , m168uidxmap.ceiling_percnt AS ceiling_percnt /* CEILING비중 */ , m168uidxmap.style_includ_percnt AS style_includ_percnt /* 스타일포함비중 */
, m168uidxcomp.f16013 AS f16013 /* 종목코드 */ , m168uidxcomp.f33711 AS f33711 /* 시장구분(1:유가2:코스닥) */ , m168uidxcomp.f03003 AS f03003 /* 전일종가 */ , m168uidxcomp.f34241 AS f34241 /* 가격산정구분(0:실시간1:종가) */ , m168uidxcomp.f30812 AS f30812 /* 상장주식수 */ , m168uidxcomp.f30813 AS f30813 /* 유동주식비율 */
FROM m168uidxmap INNER JOIN m168uidxcomp ON ( m168uidxmap.f12506 = m168uidxcomp.f12506 AND m168uidxmap.gubun = m168uidxcomp.gubun AND m168uidxmap.isin_code = m168uidxcomp.f16013 )
